Label.en: Also, La Tour must have had been planning this painting for a while: there's a duplicate!
Label.fr: Egalement, La Tour a probablement réchéflich à ce tableau un bout de temps: voici une autre version
Label.es: Also, La Tour must have had been planning this painting for a while: there's a duplicate!
Label.zh: Also, La Tour must have had been planning this painting for a while: there's a duplicate!

Label.en: It's in the Kimbell Art Museum, in Texas...
Label.fr: Il est au Kimbell Art Museum, au Texas...
Label.es: It's in the Kimbell Art Museum, in Texas...
Label.zh: It's in the Kimbell Art Museum, in Texas...

Label.en: It's virtually the same, but with some very small differences!
Label.fr: C'est presque le même avec quelques différences
Label.es: It's virtually the same, but with some very small differences!
Label.zh: It's virtually the same, but with some very small differences!

Label.en: Zoom in on the picture and try to find them all!
Label.fr: Agrandi le tableau sur ton téléphone et essaye de les repérer!
Label.es: Zoom in on the picture and try to find them all!
Label.zh: Zoom in on the picture and try to find them all!

Label.en: You are certainly no Sherlock Holmes!
